citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00PM on
14-Dec-17.
The licensee was attempted to be reached by phone however the voicemail box was full. A business card with a
note was left at the front door of licensee's facility.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00PM on
14-Dec-17.
The licensee was attempted to be reached by phone however the voicemail box was full.  A business card with a
note was left at the front door of licensee's facility.
